Html: I have started worked on Prism recently. I'm creating an application for Windows Phone 7 using Prism-Wp7. I have 2 or more view that are same except for the data. If user navigates from View1 to View2 and then View3, I need to keep all these 3 views in stack so that user can come back to View1 or View2 by  pressing the back key in Windows Phone. How can I add 3 instances of the same view to regionmanager? If I try to do this, I get an exception that an instance of the view already exists in the collection.
I would suggest trying over @ http://wp7guide.codeplex.com/ for help with the Windows Phone 7 version of Prism

Hi,

As Michael mentioned, you could use this forum. Additionally, I think that you can find interesting that the API reference of Phone is part of the latest drop (9) of Prism. You can download it from here.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero
